about_me_paragraph_1: I like making things for the web. TypeScript is my main thing. Most of my time goes into shipping web apps, messing with AI, and occasionally breaking infra (I fix it tho). Currently working on life.
about_me_paragraph_2: Outside of code, I'm usually [thinking](/thinking) about random stuff that somehow always ends up as excalidraws or getting [lost](/lost) trying to figure things out. Big fan of story-driven [games](/playing) and [listening](/listening) to [sumika](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sumika) on repeat. Currently on my first playthrough of [FFVI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Final_Fantasy_VI).
contact_description: Wanna chat? Hit me up on [Whatsapp](https://wa.me/919744375687?text=hii) or [Discord]{COPY:notalen}. You could also go the formal route with [email](mailto:alenyohannan71@gmail.com) or [schedule a meeting](/meeting) if that's more your style.
meta_description: Engineer, developer and creator of cool stuff
